criteria: End-to-end tests for tenant registration, user invitation, and login are all passing; 95% unit test coverage on all security-related Cloud Functions; No critical security vulnerabilities found in static analysis.
success_metrics: Zero regressions in the authentication flow; All user onboarding scenarios function as expected.

criteria: All core attendance workflow E2E tests (online & offline) are passing on both iOS and Android; Performance benchmarks for GPS acquisition and data sync are met; All accessibility requirements for the subordinate dashboard are verified.
bypass_criteria: None. This gate validates the core product value.
tools_used: Flutter Driver, Firebase Test Lab, VoiceOver, TalkBack
success_metrics: A user can reliably record their attendance under various network conditions.
